name: BlackBox (itch)
description:
Based on the classic game.  This is my entry for the GBJam6 game jam.  You try and locate atoms hidden in a grid by observing how rays interact with them.

Default key mapping is:

Joypad :Arrow keys

Button A: Key X

Button B: Key Z

Select: Escape

Start: Enter

The key mapping can be changed at any time by pressing F1 in the game.
